description: Installation of new entrance doors and fixed glazed screens above (at first floor level) and new cantilevered entrance canopy. (Application site is within the setting of the Grade II* Listed Newham Council Offices and Grade II Listed Buildings; Council Offices, Wall To East Ham Town Hall, Public Library, Police Station, Fellowship House, Technical College, Denmark Arms Public House and is adjoining East Ham Town Centre Conservation Area).
